alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued March 14 at 7:50AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center in Bozeman has ISSUED an AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM MDT Wednesday... * WHAT...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center has issued an avalanche warning. The avalanche danger is HIGH on all slopes. Natural and human-triggered slides are very likely. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains in Island Park. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...A large amount of new snow with strong winds are creating unstable conditions over a wide area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist. Backcountry travelers should stay off of steep slopes and stay away from the bottom of steep slopes. Avalanches can be triggered from flat terrain. Steep slopes can avalanche far above and run into lower-angled terrain. Consult www.mtavalanche.com or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
